pull.title: doc: add testnet4 section header for config file
pull.body: This PR adds the missing `testnet4` config section header documentation for the config file.

events.message: doc: add testnet4 section header for config file

events.body:
ACK 61cdb1c9d83778b95f4f9596f34617b7a191d0a5

`BUILDDIR` would need to be updated in `contrib/devtools/gen-bitcoin-conf.sh`, otherwise `bitcoind` won't be found.

comments.body:
```suggestion
- placed into sections with headers `[main]` (not `[mainnet]`), `[test]` (not `[testnet]`, for testnet3), `[testnet4]`, `[signet]` or `[regtest]`;
```

It would be `[testnet4]`, not `testnet4`.
